request.description:
### Auth Login Mobile

This endpoint allows users to log in with their mobile number.

#### Request Body
- `type` (number): The type of account. Use the following values: 2 for Parent, 3 for Supervisor, 4 for Driver, and 5 for User.
- `fcm_token` (string, optional): The FCM token for Firebase notifications.
- `handle` (string): The mobile number or email associated with the account.
- `password` (string): The password for the account. If no one-time password is passed, this field is used.

#### Response Body
The response body contains the authentication token and user details upon successful login.

     /*
     
     Accounts:

        user@admin.com => user
        company@admin.com => company
        instructor@admin.com => instructor
        accountant@admin.com => accountant
        certified@admin.com => certified
        interviewer@admin.com => interviewer
    */

    "type": 6,
    // optional, used for firebase notifications
    // "fcm_token": "FCM_TOKEN_HERE",
    "email": "user@admin.com",
    "password": "123456789"
}

request.description:
### Auth Login Mobile

This endpoint allows users to log in with their mobile number.

#### Request Body
- `type` (number): The type of account. Use the following values: 2 for Parent, 3 for Supervisor, 4 for Driver, and 5 for User.
- `fcm_token` (string, optional): The FCM token for Firebase notifications.
- `handle` (string): The mobile number or email associated with the account.
- `password` (string): The password for the account. If no one-time password is passed, this field is used.

#### Response Body
The response body contains the authentication token and user details upon successful login.
